title: Namma Yatri Driver Partner
description:
Available in Bengaluru, Delhi, Hyderabad, Chennai, Kochi, Mysuru & Tumakuru.



Namma Yatri Driver App is a community-driven initiative that connects drivers with hassle-free auto and cab ride requests. 
Built with continuous feedback from our driver community, our goal is to enhance driver earnings and ensure passengers enjoy comfortable, reliable rides. 
Join us in revolutionizing the ride-hailing experience for both autos and cabs!



🚀 Maximise Your Daily Earnings



Namma Yatri is a Zero Commission platform designed to help drivers earn more every day. Here’s how we make that happen:



✅ Zero Commission: Keep 100% of your fare — no deductions, no middlemen.

✅ Direct Payment: Customers pay you directly at the end of each trip.

✅ Earn Extra Tips: Provide great service to earn tips directly through the app.

✅ Trusted by the Community: Loved by over 2.2 lakh+ drivers and 46 lakh+ customers.

✅ Driver Welfare First: We’re committed to building a sustainable future for drivers with ongoing support and welfare programs.



⚙️ How It Works



1️⃣ Download the Namma Yatri Driver App.

2️⃣ Register with your mobile number using OTP.

3️⃣ Upload Documents – Driving License (DL) & Vehicle Registration (RC).

4️⃣ Grant Permissions – Allow access so you can receive ride requests.

5️⃣ Start Accepting Rides from nearby customers.

6️⃣ Confirm & Navigate to the pickup location.

7️⃣ Begin Ride after verifying the customer’s OTP.

8️⃣ Complete the Trip and collect payment directly from the customer.



Be part of India’s most trusted driver community.

Drive more, earn more, and grow with Namma Yatri.



🌐 Learn more at www.nammayatri.in

developerLegalAddress: 3rd Floor, Girija Building, 8th Block, Koramangala, Koramangala Vi Bk, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560095, India
recentChanges: Explore new Earnings , Plans, On boarding screens..
